Articles.Content:
Hey,

So im getting some contracts lately that require me to perform certain scientific experiments on area of different planets/moons, the one i have accepted is to perform seismic surveys at 8e7k on Ike, i have been to ike before so figured it was a nice easy one to start with, however im not entirely sure how to locate the spot. i cant find any maps or references. If anyone can help me that would be swell.

Kyotee89
There should be a survey marker that the contract adds to the map that shows the location once you get to Ike.

When you accept a survey contact the game should create a waypoint marker. If you focus view on Ike and zoom in you should see them poo up. If you click on the tags you can activate them and they show up on your nav ball. You also get a message when you enter or leave a zone.
Thanks, i see this now i have looked
You should also note that those location names are randomly generated. That is, they're completely meaningless
